While recording or casting, the service providing this feature can capture any sensitive information that is displayed on your screen or played from your device, including sensitive information such as audio, passwords, payment info, photos and messages.

string.name: global_privacy_tip
string.Data: We need to collect necessary personal information to provide you with the basic services and optimise the casting process. You can learn how we handle the information we collect in our Privacy Policy. You can withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy in the Settings at any time.

resources.string: "%1$d. Xiaomi TVs, set-top boxes, projectors: Connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same WLAN network for best effect. If they are connected to different networks, it might take more time to find the external monitor and connect. Note: Older TV models might not support casting across different networks. %2$d. If you're using TVs, set-top boxes, or projectors of other brands, connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same WLAN network. If the two devices can't be connected to the same network, turn on Miracast on your external monitor. The naming of Miracast functionality might vary."

"%1$d. Make sure your mobile device and external monitor are connected to the same Wi-Fi network. %2$d. On some Xiaomi TVs, you can set up casting from the TV as well as customise device search and verification methods."
"Tap the \"Cast\" toggle on your phone's Notification shade. Turn on both WLAN and Bluetooth for a more stable connection."
"Turn on casting in your device's Control centre, then search for an external monitor."
If you want to cast photos, videos, games or presentations, you can use built-in casting features in the corresponding apps.

"You can project items from your Xiaomi phone on most Xiaomi TV models with Bluetooth capabilities without turning on Miracast manually. If you need to turn on Miracast, press the [MENU] button and select My apps > Casting > Miracast."

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some models, you can press the [MENU] button on the remote control and then select Settings > Connection > Network > Multiple screens.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some models, you can press the [SMART] button on the remote control and then select Casting > Wireless Display. Some models also support casting for games: Hi Cast > Cast games > Android.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some models, you can select Apps > Casting > Android device > Miracast.

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SOURCE] button on the remote control and then select \"Screen Mirroring\". On some other models, you can turn this feature on in Networks > WLAN Direct. This feature is turned on by default on various models.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some models, you can select Apps > Screen Mirroring.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some models, you can select Apps > Wireless Display.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. To turn this feature on, go to My Apps > Wi-Fi Display.
First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some models, you can turn this feature on in Settings > Networks > Multiple screens > Wireless Display.

"If you can't connect to the network, make sure your external monitor supports Miracast functionality and it is turned on. On some models, this feature is called Wireless Display, Screen Mirroring or Multiple screens. View the information below to learn how to turn on Miracast. %1$d. If you encounter any issues, you can report them using our \"Services & feedback\" app."

"If you can't connect to the network, make sure your external monitor supports Miracast functionality and it is turned on. On some models, this feature is called Wireless Display, Screen Mirroring or Multiple screens. %1$d. If you encounter any issues, you can report them using our \"Services & feedback\" app."

string.name: privacy_text_1
string.Data: "Welcome to Casting! Casting allows projecting the items from your phone's screen on a bigger external monitor. We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations and privacy policies. Some features are provided by a third party service provider HappyCast. Before using this feature, read and agree to HappyCast Legal Statement and HappyCast Privacy Policy. To be able to work normally, this app needs to connect to the internet and requires the following permissions in order to collect your personal information:"

string.name: privacy_text_2
string.Data: "If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to uninstall this app, sign out or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using this feature."
